sentence: Attorney General Mark Brnovich hailed the decision as a victory: "Our office has been at the forefront of the fights for the rule of law this past year.
author: Adam Shaw
title: Federal court partially blocks Biden admin's ICE enforcement restrictions in response to GOP lawsuit

sentence: “This is a tremendous victory for the rule of law and the safety of our communities,” Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich said in a press release Tuesday.
title: Kamala Harris out as border czar?! This lawsuit says…

sentence: “Esta es una gran victoria para el estado de derecho y la seguridad de nuestras comunidades”, dijo el fiscal general de Arizona, Mark Brnovich.
title: ¿Quiénes son los inmigrantes que ICE puede deportar en Arizona?

sentence: Brnovich leads coalition of 21 states Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich is leading a coalition of 21 states in filing a motion for a preliminary injunction against the federal government’s rescission of Title 42 in Arizona v. CDC.
author: Katie Conner
title: Attorney General Mark Brnovich Expands Lawsuit Against President Biden Over Rescinding Title 42
